articles.content: After 10 months of experimentation for every position and role in the Indian team for the T20 World Cup, the Asia Cup tournament was likely to give a peek into what the team's final XI would look lik… [+2295 chars]

articles.title: 'India won't go to WC...': Ex-Indian pacer makes huge claim after Asia Cup exit - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Rohit Sharma-led Team India failed to defend their crown in the 2022 edition of the Asia Cup. Defending champions India suffered a premature exit from the continental tournament in the Super 4 stage. | Cricket
articles.content: A lot was expected from Rohit Sharma and Co. when India entered the 2022 edition of the Asia Cup as defending champions. India had lifted the famous trophy when the continental tournament was last pl… [+2113 chars]

articles.title: Harmanpreet says India played 'forcefully' in wet conditions that were 'not 100%' - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: India struggled their way to 132 after being asked to bat, found it difficult to field, and had Radha Yadav injured while diving
